articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Juche idea followers 
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received gifts from followers of the Juche idea.
 They were separately handed to officials concerned by Bruno Amoroso, director of the board of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and secretary general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Partrick Brunot, French delegate for the study of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian President 
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Palestinian President Yasser Arafat on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of the DPRK.
 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned today.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Communist Party of Norway (CPN).
 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Dag Norum, chairman of the ostfold county committee of the CPN, on a visit to the DPRK.
